1323370.name: Delinquent Community
1323370.description:
Welcome to Sterling Heights...

Play as Jacob Stains, a young male with a troubled past. In Delinquent Community, the small town of Sterling Heights is filled with many drug dealers, drug addicts, criminals, hateful individuals, and gang members. As you explore the town, it is up to you how Jacob responds to situations with other NPC's. Jacob can choose peaceful or violent dialogue when interacting with certain NPC's.

  • Explore a small town, interact with residents, and learn about the life of Jacob Stains.

  • Main story line.

  • Side Missions such as Random Bosses, Assassinations, Taxi Jobs, Lawn Mowing.

  • Activities such as Boxing, Smoking, Graffiti, Gambling, Drug Dealing, Leveraged Crypto Trading. 

  • React to situations using peaceful or violent dialogue.

  • Combat system.

  • Gore system.

  • Use different types of weapons against NPC's that can be found throughout the map and be unlocked.

  • Purchase vehicles at the car Dealership and customize the color.
1323370.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
